name: dcgm-exporter
description: NVIDIA GPU metrics exporter for Prometheus
full_description:
## License Agreements

By downloading these images, you agree to the terms of the license agreements for NVIDIA software included in the images. 

## DCGM

To find more information about DCGM, click [*here*](https://docs.nvidia.com/datacenter/dcgm/latest/index.html)

## Nvidia Container Runtime

The [Nvidia Container Runtime](https://github.com/NVIDIA/nvidia-docker) is required to run dcgm-exporter images.

dcgm-exporter is constrained by the Nvidia Driver and GPU of the host. See [dcgm-exporter requirements](https://github.com/NVIDIA/gpu-monitoring-tools/blob/master/exporters/prometheus-dcgm/README.md#prerequisites) for more details.

## NVIDIA Driver
You can find the NVIDIA Drivers license [*here*](http://www.nvidia.com/content/DriverDownload-March2009/licence.php?lang=us).

## Tags

dcgm-exporter image is only available for Ubuntu 16.04. To learn more about dcgm-exporter, click [*here*](https://github.com/NVIDIA/gpu-monitoring-tools/tree/master/exporters/prometheus-dcgm)

- [`1.0.0-beta` [DCGM 1.7.1] (*Dockerfile*)](https://github.com/NVIDIA/gpu-monitoring-tools/blob/master/exporters/prometheus-dcgm/dcgm-exporter/Dockerfile)
- [`1.4.6` [DCGM 1.4.6] (*Dockerfile*)](https://github.com/NVIDIA/gpu-monitoring-tools/blob/master/exporters/prometheus-dcgm/dcgm-exporter/Dockerfile)
- [`1.4.3` [DCGM 1.4.3] (*Dockerfile*)](https://github.com/NVIDIA/gpu-monitoring-tools/blob/master/exporters/prometheus-dcgm/dcgm-exporter/Dockerfile)
